recipesJson.name: Lot Lizard Special (Peaches and Cream)
recipesJson.author: VapinTrucker
recipesJson.description:
https://youtu.be/PtX9xYDJAKY

NOTE  The recipe has changed from the linked video in peach percentage with the addition of sweetener. The peach was falling a little flat but the sweetener perked it right up. Hope you enjoy!!


Sorry About the name...LOL  But If you Know Peaches you know she is Special.

JF Honey Peach - Deep dark peach with notes of honey that don't go cat pee on me

FLV Cream - Lovely cream flavor here adds body to the mix as well as acts as a blender to mix everything together

FA White Peach - A nice bright peach to add some juciness and a great peach flavor when combined with the other peach. This peach for me had no throat hit after the steep

LB Vanilla Ice Cream - A wonderful creamy light vanilla ice cream Type of flavor if you search hard you can find a little eggyness and has a great mouthfeel

INW Shisha Vanilla - This adds some more vanilla and helps to add to the mouthfeel as well.  This is IMO a great versatile  vanilla.

Truly delicious peach and cream. Would love to find cobbler base to go with it. Keep up the great work on recipes and keep it between the ditches man.
